Description: Define and run multi-container applications with Docker.

data.-f, --file FILE: Specify an alternate compose file (default: docker-compose.yml)
data.-p, --project-name NAME: Specify an alternate project name (default: directory name)
data.--log-level LEVEL: Set log level (DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL)
data.--no-ansi: Do not print ANSI control characters
data.--tlscacert CA_PATH: Trust certs signed only by this CA
data.--tlsverify: Use TLS and verify the remote
data.--skip-hostname-check: Don't check the daemon's hostname against the name specified in the client certificate
data.--project-directory PATH: Specify an alternate working directory (default: the path of the Compose file)
data.--compatibility: If set, Compose will attempt to convert deploy keys in v3 files to their non-Swarm equivalent

data.docker-compose bundle: Generate a Docker bundle from the Compose file
data.docker-compose config: Validate and view the Compose file
data.docker-compose down: Stop and remove containers, networks, images, and volumes
data.docker-compose events: Receive real time events from containers
data.docker-compose exec: Execute a command in a running container
data.docker-compose port: Print the public port for a port binding
data.docker-compose scale: Set number of containers for a service
